resources.string: Touch any text box to start typing
^1 contains less than 6 or more than 30 characters.
^1" can contain only letters, numbers and full stops."
Your phone is not connected to a mobile data service. To view this information now, go to %s in a web browser.
If you have previously backed up your settings, they will be restored.
Your settings will not be restored from backup.
"Your company's servers are sending sign-in information to your phone. This may take a few minutes. Your company's sign-in page will appear when this is complete."
This domain is not using Google Apps. Please check the domain name and try again.

You can use your Google Account to back up your apps, settings (such as bookmarks and Wi-Fi passwords) and other data. If you previously backed up with this account, you can restore it to this device now.
Restore from my Google Account to this device
Keep this device backed up with my Google Account
By continuing, you agree to the Google and Additional Privacy Policies.

Touch Activate" to activate your mobile service now. (It may take a couple of minutes.)
Or touch "Skip to set up your phone using a Wi-Fi connection instead.
Touch Activate to activate your mobile service now. (It may take a couple of minutes.)

"Until you activate your mobile data service, most of your phone's features won't work.
If you prefer to skip now, you can activate later in Settings."
Touch Skip to complete setup using a Wi-Fi connection instead
Activation can take a few minutes. Touch Skip to complete setup using a Wi-Fi connection instead.
Activation can take a few minutes.
Activation can take a few minutes.
Activation can take a few minutes.
Touch Next to continue with setup.
Your device must reboot to complete activation.

Touch Next" to continue.
Activation successful, but it may take a few minutes for the mobile data network to become available."

"Your mobile data service couldn't be activated. This may be a temporary problem.
If you prefer to skip now, make sure that you activate later in Settings. Until you activate, most of your phone's features won't work."
"Your mobile data service couldn't be activated. This may be a temporary problem and may be solved by restarting the phone."

Unable to activate mobile data service. To try activation again, touch Try again".
You can activate your mobile data service later in Settings, under "Wireless & networks > Mobile networks

Are you sure that you want to cancel activation? You must activate your mobile network service before you can use it to connect to the Internet. To try activation again, touch Back".
Touch "Next" to complete setup using a Wi-Fi connection.
You can activate your mobile network service later in Settings under "Wireless & networks > Mobile networks.

"Activation cancelled.
You can activate your mobile data service later in Settings, under "Wireless & networks > Mobile networks.

An error occurred that requires shutting down and restarting your phone before another activation attempt can be made. Your phone will shut down automatically in 60 seconds or you can touch Shut down now".
Once your phone has shut down, press its Power button to restart it."
Tap here to rerun Setup Wizard
The phone uses your name to personalise some apps.

"Google's location service uses data from sources such as Wi-Fi and mobile networks to help apps determine your approximate location, even when GPS isn't available.
You can change these options at any time in Settings."

"Google's location service uses data from sources such as Wi-Fi networks to help apps determine your approximate location, even when GPS isn't available.
You can change these options at any time in Settings."
"Allow Google's location service to collect anonymous location data. Some data may be stored on your device. Collection may occur even when no apps are running."
Use my location for Google search results and other Google services.

"You agree that your phone may receive and install updates from Google.
Your use of this phone is subject to the privacy policy and other terms. "Learn more
Your phone is set up and ready to use.
Start Verizon Backup Assistant to restore contacts from another Verizon phone.
Would you like to set up wireless data service? This month-to-month, pay-as-you-go service has options that fit all lifestyles. If you don’t, you can do it later from the Settings menu.
Read the instructions that came with your phone.
